name: Daily ETF Bollinger RSI Mean Reverter
description: Long-only mean-reversion system for liquid equity ETFs (represented here by large-cap equity tickers). Enters when daily close breaches lower Bollinger Band (20,2) and RSI(14) < 30; exits on middle band cross or RSI > 50. Risk fixed at 1 % of equity with 1.5 % stop and 3 % profit target to maintain 2:1 reward-to-risk.
